title: The Massacre of the Innocents
artistDisplayName:
Max Ernst
American and French, born Germany, 1891-1976
medium: Black-and-white photograph with hand-coloring in watercolor, gouache, and black ink, laid down on tan wove wood-pulp paper
dimensions: Primary support: 21.5 × 28.9 cm (8 1/2 × 11 7/16 in.); Secondary support, sight: 29.5 × 38 cm (11 5/8 × 15 in.)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Lindy and Edwin Bergman Collection
